Product Categories

Connector Systems

PH Series

2.0mm pitch wire-to-board connectors. High-density packaging for compact applications.

2.0mm Pitch 2-15 Positions

XH Series

2.5mm pitch connectors with positive locking mechanism. Secure connection reliability.

2.5mm Pitch Positive Lock

EH Series

2.5mm pitch ejector headers. Tool-free disconnect for high-maintenance applications.

2.5mm Pitch Ejector Design

Custom Harness

Full custom cable assemblies. From design documentation to final production assembly.

Custom Design Rapid Proto
